column4: how can I resize my ubuntu ext4 partition? (was created in a 2TB hard disk, 500gbs for ubuntu)
I want to keep my original data (about 30gbs) and divide the partition into 2 250gbs paritions.
boot from a liveCD and run gparted
if you stick the cd that you installed Ubuntu from into your computer drive and reboot it should run off of the CD
